Soha

Korean: 서하

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Ahn Seo-hyun
Native name:
안서현
Birthday:
Sep 18, 1998
Age:
26 years old

Introduction

Soha is a South Korean singer and songwriter under BTC Entertainment who made her solo debut on December 15, 2022 with the EP "Sweet & Sour". She was a member of the girl group White Witch. She is a vocalist for the virtual girl group Eternity and the virtual soloist Aimy Moon. She was a contestant on Burn Up 30.
